name: Conditionals
description: Conditional logic with q:if, q:else, and q:elseif

examples.title: Simple If
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Simple If Test -->
<q:component name="SimpleIf" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 == 1">
    <q:return value="Condition is true!" />
  <q:else>
    <q:return value="Condition is false!" />
  </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: Conditionals Complete
examples.output: Result: Passed, Status: Good, Grade: B (with bonus), Range: In 80s range
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Conditionals Complete -->
<!-- Demonstrates all conditional patterns -->
<q:component name="TestConditionalsComplete" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">

  <q:set name="score" type="number" value="85" />
  <q:set name="hasBonus" type="boolean" value="true" />
  <q:set name="result" value="" />

  <!-- Simple if -->
  <q:if condition="score >= 60">
    <q:set name="result" value="Passed" />
  </q:if>

  <!-- If with else -->
  <q:set name="status" value="" />
  <q:if condition="score >= 90">
    <q:set name="status" value="Excellent" />
    <q:else>
      <q:set name="status" value="Good" />
    </q:else>
  </q:if>

  <!-- If with elseif and else -->
  <q:set name="grade" value="" />
  <q:if condition="score >= 90">
    <q:set name="grade" value="A" />
    <q:elseif condition="score >= 80">
      <q:set name="grade" value="B" />
    </q:elseif>
    <q:elseif condition="score >= 70">
      <q:set name="grade" value="C" />
    </q:elseif>
    <q:elseif condition="score >= 60">
      <q:set name="grade" value="D" />
    </q:elseif>
    <q:else>
      <q:set name="grade" value="F" />
    </q:else>
  </q:if>

  <!-- Boolean conditions -->
  <q:set name="bonusText" value="" />
  <q:if condition="hasBonus == true">
    <q:set name="bonusText" value=" (with bonus)" />
  </q:if>

  <!-- Comparison operators -->
  <q:set name="comparison" value="" />
  <q:if condition="score > 80 and score < 90">
    <q:set name="comparison" value="In 80s range" />
  </q:if>

  <q:return value="Result: {result}, Status: {status}, Grade: {grade}{bonusText}, Range: {comparison}" />
</q:component>

examples.title: Conditionals
examples.output: Execution Error: Validation errors: ["Required parameter 'age' is missing"]
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Conditional Logic -->
<q:component name="TestConditionals" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:param name="age" type="number" required="true" />
  <q:param name="hasParentConsent" type="boolean" default="false" />
  
  <q:if condition="age >= 18">
    <q:return value="Adult content available" />
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: Else Fixed
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Else Block -->
<q:component name="TestElseBlock" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 > 5">
    <q:return value="This should NOT show" />
    <q:else>
      <q:return value="Else block should show!" />
    </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: Else
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Else Block -->
<q:component name="TestElse" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="False">
    <q:return value="Should not show" />
  </q:if>
  
  <q:if condition="True">
    <q:return value="This should show!" />
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: Elseif
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test ElseIf -->
<q:component name="TestElseIf" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 == 2">
    <q:return value="First condition false" />
    <q:elseif condition="2 == 2">
      <q:return value="ElseIf condition is true!" />
    </q:elseif>
    <q:else>
      <q:return value="Else block" />
    </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: False Else
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test False Condition with Else -->
<q:component name="TestFalseCondition" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 > 5">
    <q:return value="This should NOT show" />
  <q:else>
    <q:return value="Else block should show!" />
  </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: If Else Correct
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test If-Else (Correct Structure) -->
<q:component name="TestIfElse" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 == 2">
    <q:return value="This should not execute" />
    <q:else>
      <q:return value="Else block executed!" />
    </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: If Else Fixed
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test If-Else (Fixed) -->
<q:component name="TestIfElse" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="1 == 2">
    <q:return value="This should not execute" />
  <q:else>
    <q:return value="Else block executed!" />
  </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>

examples.title: If Else
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test If-Else -->
<q:component name="TestIfElse" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:if condition="2 > 5">
    <q:return value="This should not execute" />
  <q:else>
    <q:return value="Else block executed successfully!" />
  </q:else>
  </q:if>
</q:component>
